remarks: If a wff is true for an ordinal number, there is the smallest ordinal number for which it is true.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 20-Nov-2016.)
statement:
onminex.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
onminex $p |- ( E. x e. On ph -> E. x e. On ( ph /\ A. y e. x -. ps ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
